name: asha
description: Asha is a library for creating and sharing interactive application. It's built with [SvelteKit](https://kit.svelte.dev/), [Svelte](https://svelte.dev/), [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) and [XState](https://xstate.js.org). Asha means "The Life" in Swahili . It's also the name of my daughter.
